feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Okta(SCIM2.0) -> Attributes Sync and Group Option support by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17805
  • feat: v1 booking "created at" field in response by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18038
  • feat: conferencing atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17988
  • feat: Enable SCIM logging that can be configured through constant by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18043
  • chore: Add host default language to workflow reminder weekdays by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18029
  • fix: Schedule a timezone change only allows you to select one day not date range by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18045
  • fix: Do not consider salesforce ownership when making rerouting decision by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18034
  • fix: When crating a new event from a team event list, the cancel button redirects to /event-types # by @HirenDhadhal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18058
  • feat: domain wide delegation UI by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18013
  • chore: add user profile to org user endpoints apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18039
  • fix: add onTouchEnd for mobile apps by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18040
  • feat: resizing in DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17973
  • chore: use app router - /apps main page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16980
  • feat: v2 teams memberships endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18041
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18063
  • fix: add members page back to settings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18065
  • fix: team event is leading to a 404 page due to slug conflict by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18055
  • feat: Use Stripe paymentElement with multiple payment methods by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18056
  • docs: Fix OAuth casing by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18066
  • chore: rearrange platform docs tabs order by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18068
  • chore: enable markdown for platform atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18069
  • chore: Remove pages/settings by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18064
  • feat: banner and avatars for Booker atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17821
  • fix: public booking page serialization error by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18070
  • feat: remove 2 steps from the onboarding flow for google signups by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17787
  • fix: Request permissions for shared Office365/Outlook calendars by @toontoet in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17760
  • chore: Add location to workflow reminder template by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17449
  • fix: not able to mark no show by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17980
  • chore: fixed days of trial by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18074
  • fix: sorting insights table for booking status by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17982
  • fix: can't edit ooo by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18020
  • feat: Add OAuth support for closecom app linking by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17936

New Contributors

  • @HirenDhadhal made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18058
  • @toontoet made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.19...v4.7.20

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build: Change alpine image to one compatible with Prisma by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18080
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18078
  • feat: ability to require an email by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18057
  • fix: Not able to create consecutive ooo by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17388
  • feat: remove setup-availability step in onboarding flow by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17799
  • feat: Show routing reason on booking page [CAL-4814] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18053
  • chore: Remove Pages Router / Use App Router - more, maintenance, upgrade, connect-and-join by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16531
  • chore: app router migration - /enterprise and d/[link]/[slug] by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18101
  • chore: remove extra fetching and get user locale from headers in settings pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18048
  • chore: remove pages router and use app router for /insights pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18088

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.20...v4.7.21

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.22
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18100
  • feat: assigned bookings per period by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17940
  • chore: Remove Pages Router / Use App Router - /workflows by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16519
  • fix: Insights team filter behavior by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18084
  • feat: Title - AI translation for booking pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17794
  • fix: prevent infinite rerendering of DataTable by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18087
  • revert: "fix: Request permissions to allow events to be created on shâ€¦ by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18111
  • chore: Remove Pages Router / Render App Router - /video by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16518
  • chore: Add CODEOWNERS by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18116
  • fix: Error on webhooks page exporting client only comp directly by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18118
  • fix: do not export client components directly in app routes by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18122
  • fix: correct line-breaks in calendar event description by @michaelvalette in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18077
  • feat: Change 'add override' to 'save override' by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17434
  • refactor: improved observability for Salesforce by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18125

New Contributors

  • @michaelvalette made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18077

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.21...v4.7.22

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build: Node alpine libssl symlink fix by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18127
  • fix: Salesforce - only call create prospect record once by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18131
  • fix: CRM error log by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18105
  • fix: store default booking fields when creating event by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18108
  • feat: weights per attribute UI by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18109
  • fix: early return if no users are found to prevent prisma error by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18133
  • chore: add successRedirectUrl to event-types api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18136
  • fix: filling users logic by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18128

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.22...v4.7.24

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: show tooltip below the delete button by @sanchitttt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18135
  • fix: update get booking output for v2 by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18082
  • fix: Searching users in admin page not working by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18140
  • fix: default to 100 when attribute weight undefined by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18145
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18139
  • fix: Prisma validation error in generateMetadata (workflows) by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18149
  • refactor: improved observability in google calendar service by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18147
  • chore: fix misleading test names by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18154
  • fix: ensure migrated pages are added to config.matcher in middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18153
  • chore: use getTranslate instead by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18148
  • chore: i18n - remove hardcoded strings by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18156
  • chore: Upgrade actions/upload-artifact to v4 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18160
  • fix: Hyperlinks not highlighted in eventmeta by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18120
  • chore: small changes for platform booker embed by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18159
  • chore: /availability - Remove Pages Router / Render App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16517

New Contributors

  • @sanchitttt made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.24...v4.7.25
